text: The 2007–08 OK Liga was the 39th season of the top-tier league of rink hockey in Spain. Barcelona Sorli Discau finished the league as champion. ==Competition format== Sixteen teams joined the league. The eight first teams at the end of the regular season qualified for the playoffs while the three last teams were relegated to Primera División. ==Regular season== ==Playoffs== Quarterfinals were played with a best-of-three format, while semifinals and final were played with a best-of-five series. Seeded teams played games 1, 2 and 5 of each series at home. ==Final standings== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width=30| !! Team !! Qualification or relegation |- bgcolor=#BBF3BB | 1 || align=left|Barcelona Sorli Discau || rowspan=5|CERH European League |- bgcolor=#BBF3BB | 2 || align=left|Alnimar Reus Deportiu |- bgcolor=#BBF3BB | 3 || align=left|Coinasa Liceo |- bgcolor=#BBF3BB | 4 || align=left|Noia Freixenet |- bgcolor=#BBF3BB | 5 || align=left|Roncato Vic |- bgcolor=#BBF3FF | 6 || align=left|Viva Hàbitat Blanes || CERS Cup |- bgcolor=#BBF3BB | 7 || align=left|Cemex Tenerife || rowspan=2|CERH European League |- bgcolor=#BBF3BB | 8 || align=left|Proinosa Igualada |- bgcolor=#BBF3FF | 9 || align=left|Grup Clima Mataró || CERS Cup |- bgcolor=#BBF3BB | 10 || align=left|Vilanova L'Ull Blau || CERH European League |- | 11 || align=left|Grup Castillo Lleida || |- bgcolor=#BBF3FF | 12 || align=left|Grup Lloret || CERS Cup |- | 13 || align=left|Güell Voltregà || |- bgcolor=#FFBBBB | 14 || align=left|Epson Cerdanyola || rowspan=3|Relegation to Primera División |- bgcolor=#FFBBBB | 15 || align=left|Caixa Penedès Vilafranca |- bgcolor=#FFBBBB | 16 || align=left|Esfer Oviedo |} ==Copa del Rey== The 2008 Copa del Rey was the 65th edition of the Spanish men's roller hockey cup. It was played in Igualada between the eight first qualified teams after the first half of the season. Noia Freixenet won its 2nd cup, ten years after its first one. ==References== ==External links== *Real Federación Española de Patinaje Category:OK Liga seasons Category:2008 in roller hockey Category:2007 in roller hockey Category:2008 in Spanish sport Category:2007 in Spanish sport
title: 2007–08 OK Liga
